name: Guardian of Earth: Resquirrel
description:
Important!

We just found out that there's a bug causing the game to crash, this build still has it and we will be re-uploading as soon as it's fixed :)

Goal:

Pickup and throw all human trash to the recycle bins which are spread across the park before time runs out!

Controls:

WASD - Move 
Shift - Run
Space - Jump
Click - Pickup or Throw trash in the recycle bin
Mouse - Rotate Camera Left/Right
Scroll wheel - Zoom in/out

Extra credits:

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
